body: Client-set RPC timeouts/deadlines are ignored by the server for long poll `GetWorkflowExecutionHistory` calls starting in v1.29.0. The server waits the full long poll interval (~20s) instead of respecting the client's deadline.

comments.body: Actually, the server responds with an empty response 1s before the client set deadline is reached.

title: Client-set RPC deadline is ignored for long poll `GetWorkflowExecutionHistory`
